import React, { useEffect } from 'react' const Statewise = () => { const getCovidData = async () => { const res = await fetch('https://data.covid19india.org/data.json') const actualData = await res.json(); console.log(actualData.statewise); } useEffect(()=>{ getCovidData() },[]) return ( <>

INDIA COVID-19 Dashboard

State Confirmed Recovered Deaths Active Updated
State Confirmed Recovered Deaths Active Updated
) } export default Statewise
